## Description {#details}

Describes the uses of a parameter by the function.

## Public Member Attributes

### Calls {#a8fcf77bc273142cf1ffbbf314b0ead71}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt;Call&gt; llvm::FunctionSummary::ParamAccess::Calls</>}>
In the per-module summary, it summarizes the byte offset applied to each pointer parameter before passing to each corresponding callee.

In the combined summary, it&#39;s empty and information is propagated by inter-procedural analysis and applied to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> field.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00865">865</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ParamNo {#a2c19c33bc6f339b9fe5c59d40f1652ad}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t llvm::FunctionSummary::ParamAccess::ParamNo = 0</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00855">855</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Use {#ab67ff0ea76bf284ee2ac430e8a9325c8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConstantRange llvm::FunctionSummary::ParamAccess::Use &#123;<a href="#ad7b7723aa791b53f4fe0a4f88613a8bd">RangeWidth</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>&#125;</>}>
The range contains byte offsets from the parameter pointer which accessed by the function.

In the per-module summary, it only includes accesses made by the function instructions. In the combined summary, it also includes accesses by nested function calls.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h/#l00860">860</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
